author: andschwa
body: Import changes from Source Depot (again). - [x] tag the "merge" (cherry-picked commit) - [x] reset `source-depot` branch to original sources (for diffing) Both items to be done post approval. @lzybkr yay for `ConsoleHost` changes making it in officially. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/1018)
title: Merge SD changes
